meanings.definition: Excessive belief in one's own abilities or judgment.
meanings.sent1: His overconfidences led him to take unnecessary risks.
meanings.sent2: Her overconfidences often blinded her to her own limitations.
meanings.sent3: Despite his overconfidences, he still needed help from others.
meanings.sent4: The overconfidences of the young athlete cost him the game.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's overconfidences in her students motivated them to excel.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly confident.
meanings.sent1: The team's overconfidences were shattered after their defeat.
meanings.sent2: His overconfidences were evident in the way he carried himself.
meanings.sent3: The cat's overconfidences in catching the mouse were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The overconfidences of the CEO led to the company's downfall.
meanings.sent5: The overconfidences of the weather forecasters resulted in a surprise storm.
